Uses of TemplateLoader.Template in org.teatrove.tea.engine
 

Subinterfaces of TemplateLoader.Template in org.teatrove.tea.engine
 interface Template
          While Templates already have access to the loader that loaded them, this interface enables them to gain access to their TemplateSource.
